short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension calculates the GPA for Northern Valley Regional High School at Demarest Students

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
free, easy, and open-source GPA calculator for NVD students.

Feedback:
https://github.com/tenebo/DemarestGPA/issues
